name: @tgnd/outbound-adapters
description: TGND field platform adapters: push jobs, platform_job_id, status sync (WorkMarket, etc.)

scripts.test: node -e "const A=require('./src/index.js'); const a=A.createWorkMarketAdapter({}); a.push({id:'wo-1', external_id:'ext-1', status:'scheduling', ship_to:{address_line1:'123 Main', city:'Sacramento', state:'CA', zip:'95834'}}).then(r=>console.log('push result', r));"

author: TGND
